sections.text: to the cost of credentialing.Adjustments to the cost of credentialing include, but are not limited to:(1) Revenue from sources that include, but are not limited to:(a) Interest earned on the Professional and Occupational Credentialing Cash Fund, if any;(b) Certification and verification of credentials;(c) Administrative fees;(d) Reinstatement fees;(e) General Funds and federal funds;(f) Fees for miscellaneous services, such as production of photocopies, lists, labels, and diskettes;(g) Gifts; and(h) Grants;(2) Transfers to other funds for costs related to the Nebraska Regulation of Health Professions Act and section 38-128; and(3) Costs associated with subsection (3) of section 38-155.SourceLaws 2003, LB 242, § 26;R.S.1943, (2003), § 71-162.03;Laws 2007, LB463, § 54;Laws 2019, LB112, § 9.Cross ReferencesNebraska Regulation of Health Professions Act, see section 71-6201.
